name: VaricellaTestsForVaricellaZosterVirusNucleicAcid
title: Varicella (Tests for Varicella zoster virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Varicella zoster virus nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Varicella zoster probe/non-probe
HSV+VZV DNA),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
